description:
As a user,
    I want to stay signed in across sessions,
    So that I donâ€™t have to log in every time.

elements.name: Checkbox can be toggled

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the checkbox should be unselected by default
the user clicks the checkbox
it becomes selected

name: Keep Me Signed In Checkbox

description:
As a user,
    I want to see the login form elements clearly,
    So that I can attempt to sign in without confusion.

elements.name: All form elements are visible

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the email input field is visible
the password input field is visible
the keep me signed in checkbox is visible
the sign in button is visible
the login "Forgot your password?" link is visible
the login "Do not have an account?" link is visible
the login "Footer" text is visible
the login "Contact us" link is visible

name: Login Form Display

description:
As a user,
    I want the login form inputs to behave correctly,
    So that I can have a smooth and secure login experience.

elements.name: Email field is typeable

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email
the email field should contain the entered email

elements.name: Password field is typeable

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user types a valid password into the password field
the password field should contain the entered password

elements.name: Password input should be masked

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the password field input type should be "password"

elements.name: Email field accepts alphanumeric and special characters

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email with special characters into the email field
the email field should contain the correct value

elements.name: Password field accepts complex passwords

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a complex password with special characters into the password field
the password field should contain the correct value

name: Login Input Field Validation

description:
As a user,
    I want to be notified if my credentials are incorrect,
    So that I can retry logging in.

elements.name: Login with incorrect password

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email and an invalid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
an error message is displayed

elements.name: Login with unregistered email

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters an unregistered email and any password
clicks the "Sign in" button
an error message is displayed

elements.name: Login with email containing leading spaces

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters email with leading spaces in the email field
the user enters a valid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
an error message is displayed
both input fields and labels are highlighted in red

elements.name: Login with email containing tailing spaces

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters email with tailing spaces in the email field
the user enters a valid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
an error message is displayed
both input fields and labels are highlighted in red

elements.name: Login with both fields empty

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user clicks the "Sign in" button
a toast error message is displayed
both input fields and labels are highlighted in red

elements.name: Login with missing password

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email in the email field
clicks the "Sign in" button
a toast error message is displayed
only the password input and label are red

elements.name: Login with missing email

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid password in the password field
clicks the "Sign in" button
a toast error message is displayed
only the email input and label are red

elements.name: Login with space-only email and password

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters "     " in the email field
the user enters "     " in the password field
clicks the "Sign in" button
a toast error message is displayed
both input fields and labels are highlighted in red

elements.name: Login with email in uppercase and wrong password

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email in uppercase in the email field
the user enters an invalid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
an error message is displayed

name: Failed Login Attempt

description:
As a user,
    I want to navigate to registration or password recovery easily,
    So that I can access my account or create one.

elements.name: Forgot password link works

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user clicks the Forgot your password link
the user is navigated to the password recovery page

elements.name: Registration link works

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user clicks the Do not have an account link
the user is navigated to the registration page

name: Navigation Links on Login Page

description:
As a user,
    I want secure behavior while logging in,
    So that my credentials and session are safe.

elements.name: User cannot access dashboard without login

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user navigates directly to the dashboard URL
the user redirected to the login page

elements.name: SQL injection in email field fails

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters "' OR 1=1 --" in the email field
the user enters a valid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
a human verification error message is displayed

elements.name: Session cookie is created upon successful login

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a totp valid email and password
clicks the "Sign in" button
the user is redirected to MFA page
the user enters the MFA code
the user is logged in successfully
a session cookie is created

elements.name: Email with leading and trailing spaces fails

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters email with leading and trailing spaces in the email field
the user enters a valid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
a human verification error message is displayed

elements.name: Email and password filled via automation are blocked

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user fills the email and password fields using automation
clicks the "Sign in" button
a human verification error message is displayed

name: Login Security and Behavior

description:
As a registered user,
    I want to sign in using valid credentials,
    So that I can access my NinjaOne dashboard.

elements.name: Login with valid credentials

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email and password
clicks the "Sign in" button
the user is redirected to MFA page

elements.name: Login with email in uppercase

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email in uppercase in the email field
the user enters a valid password
clicks the "Sign in" button
the user is redirected to MFA page

elements.name: Login by pressing Enter key

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email and password
presses the Enter key
the user is redirected to MFA page

elements.name: Login with "Keep me signed in" selected

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user selects the "Keep me signed in" checkbox
the user enters a valid email and password
clicks the "Sign in" button
the user is redirected to MFA page
the session is persisted

elements.name: Login by pressing Enter key

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email and password
presses the Enter key
the user is redirected to MFA page

elements.name: Successful login with valid credentials and TOTP code

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a totp valid email and password
clicks the "Sign in" button
the user is redirected to MFA page
the user enters the MFA code
the user is logged in successfully

description:
As a new user,
    I want to see all necessary registration form elements,
    So that I can register with confidence.

elements.name: All registration form elements are visible

steps.name: the user is on the registration page
the organization input field is visible
the first name input field is visible
the last name input field is visible
the registration email input field is visible
the registration password input field is visible
the verify password input field is visible
the cell phone input field is visible
the language dropdown is visible
the register button is visible
the missing activation email link is visible
the logo is visible

name: Registration Form Display

description:
As a user,
    I want the registration form to validate each field properly,
    So that I am guided to correct my mistakes before submission.

elements.name: Cell phone field is empty

steps.name: the user is on the registration page
the user leaves the cell phone field empty
clicks the register button
an invalid phone number error should be shown
the cell phone error text should be red
the cell phone input should have error styling
the cell phone label should be red

the user attempts to type letters in the phone number field
the phone number field should remain empty

elements.name: Cell phone field shows error when all digits are the same

steps.name: the user is on the registration page
the user enters "9999999999" in the phone number field
clicks the register button
an invalid phone number error should be shown
the cell phone error text should be red
the cell phone input should have error styling
the cell phone label should be red

steps.name: the user is on the registration page
the user enters "1112223333" in the phone number field
clicks the register button

the cell phone error text should be red
the cell phone input should have error styling
the cell phone label should be red

description:
As a user,

    So that I can resend my activation email without confusion.

the "Resend Activation" title is visible
the email label is visible

clicks the resend activation submit button

the login page should be displayed

elements.name: Error is shown when phone number does not match user

steps.name: the user is on the reset password page
the user opens the identity method dropdown
the user selects "Text"
the user enters a valid registered email in the reset password email field
the user enters incorrect last 4 digits of their phone number
clicks the forgot your password send button
an error toast with "Error during password reset" should be shown

name: Reset Password via Text - Invalid Scenarios

description:
As a user,
    I want to reset my password using a valid email address,
    So that I can regain access to my account.

elements.name: Password recovery modal is shown when a valid email is entered

steps.name: the user is on the reset password page
the user opens the identity method dropdown
the user selects "Email"
the user enters a valid registered email in the reset password email field
clicks the forgot your password send button
a password recovery modal with "Password recovery email sent" should be shown

name: Password Reset - Valid Email Flow

description:
As a user,
    I want to request a password reset using valid email and phone number
    So that I can receive a password recovery email successfully

elements.name: Valid email and matching last 4 digits of phone number

steps.name: the user is on the reset password page
the user opens the identity method dropdown
the user selects "Text"
the user enters a valid registered email in the reset password email field
the user enters the correct last four digits of their phone number
clicks the forgot your password send button
the security code input should be visible and typeable

name: Valid Reset Password Request via Text
